description: The Outcast Sellsword is a mercenary who wanders the lands, selling their sword to the highest bidder. Once part of a noble army, their betrayal led to a life of solitude and survival by any means necessary. They are cunning, resourceful, and ruthless, but they hold to a personal code of honor that prevents them from harming innocents.

traits.description: The Outcast Sellsword can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The Outcast Sellsword makes two melee attacks with its longsword.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Crossbow
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.
